REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Sub Arbeitsblatt_drucken() Dim vStatus as Variant Dim sSQL1 as String,sSQL2 as String,sSQL3 as String,sSQL4 as String Dim oRecord1 as Object,oRecord2 as Object Dim ifLV_Pos as integer,sifLV_Pos as String
Dim sAnschrift as String,sProjektID as String,sProjekt_Name as String,sProjektBezeichnung as String,sDocumentName as String Dim sAnrede as String,sTitel as String,sVorname as String,sName1 as String Dim sName2 as String,sName3 as String,sName4 as String Dim sLand as String,sLand_Eigen as String,sPLZ as String,sOrt as String Dim sStrasse as String,sHausnummer as String,sPos as String,sNummern as String
if lDocumentID > 0 then Drucktabellen_leeren(iUserID_lokal) Pos_neu()
sSQL1="SELECT t1.Anrede,t1.Name1,t1.Titel,t1.Vorname,t1.Name2,t1.Name3,t1.Name4,t1.Land,"&_ "t1.PLZ,t1.Ort,t1.Strasse,t1.Hausnummer,t3.ProjektID,t2.Projekt_Name,t4.Land,t3.Document_Name"&_ " FROM "& sTabelle1 &" as t3,"& sProjekte &" as t2,"& sKontakte &" as t1,Einstellungen as t4"&_ " WHERE t3.DocumentID="& lDocumentID &_ " AND t1.KontaktID=t3.KontaktID"&_ " AND t2.ProjektID=t3.ProjektID"&_ " AND t4.EinstellungsID= "& iEinstellungsID_lokal
oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() sAnrede=oRecord1.getString(1) sName1=oRecord1.getString(2) sTitel=oRecord1.getString(3) sVorname=oRecord1.getString(4) sName2=oRecord1.getString(5) sName3=oRecord1.getString(6) sName4=oRecord1.getString(7) sLand=oRecord1.getString(8) sPLZ=oRecord1.getString(9) sOrt=oRecord1.getString(10) sStrasse=oRecord1.getString(11) sHausnummer=oRecord1.getString(12) sProjektID=oRecord1.getString(13) sProjekt_Name=oRecord1.getString(14) sLand_Eigen=oRecord1.getString(15) sDocumentName=oRecord1.getString(16) Wend
sSQL2="SELECT LV_Pos FROM "& sArbeitstabelle &" ORDER BY LV_Pos ASC limit 1" oRecord2=oResult(sSQL2) While oRecord2.next() sifLV_Pos = oRecord2.getString(1) Wend
if sifLV_Pos <> "" then vStatus=MsgBox("Soll statt der fortlaufenden Nummer die LV-Positionen im Arbeitsblatt gedruckt werden?",36,sTitle_lokal) else sPos="Pos" End if
if vStatus=6 then sPos="LV_Pos" elseif vStatus=7 then sPos="Pos" End if
sAnschrift=""
if sTitel <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sTitel + " " End if if sVorname <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sVorname + " " End if if sName1 <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sName1 + "\n" End if if sStrasse <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sStrasse + " " End if if sHausnummer <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sHausnummer + "\n" else sAnschrift = sAnschrift + "\n" End if if sPLZ <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sPLZ + " " End if if sOrt <> "" then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + sOrt + "\n" End if if sLand <> "" AND UCASE(sLand) <> UCASE(sLand_Eigen) then sAnschrift = sAnschrift + UCASE(sLand) End if if sProjektID = "0" then sProjektBezeichnung=sDocumentName else sProjektBezeichnung=sProjekt_Name End if
sSQL3="INSERT INTO "& sDrucker1_TEMP(iUserID_lokal) &_ " (DocumentID,Document_TypID,Document_Name,Nummern,Anschrift)"&_ " SELECT distinct '"& lDocumentID &"',t1.Document_TypID,"&_ " concat('"& fsConvertApostroph(sProjektBezeichnung) &"'),'"& sProjektID &"',concat('"& sAnschrift &"')"&_ " FROM "& sTabelle1 &" as t1"&_ " WHERE t1.DocumentID="& lDocumentID SQL_execute(sSQL3)
sSQL4="INSERT INTO "& sDrucker2_TEMP(iUserID_lokal) &" (PosID,Pos,Pos_TypID,DocumentID,LeistungsID,Leistungsbezeichnung,Menge,GZ)"&_ " SELECT distinct t1.Pos,t1."& sPos &",t1.Pos_TypID,t1.DocumentID,t1.LeistungsID,t1.Leistungsbezeichnung,t1.Menge,t1.GZ"&_ " FROM "& sArbeitstabelle &" as t1 ORDER BY Pos ASC" SQL_execute(sSQL4) SetUserID(iUserID_lokal) ArbeitsblattPrint() else MsgBox("Sie haben noch keine Document ausgewählt oder angelegt!",16,sTitle_lokal) End if End sub
